The autocratic governments[ in the Middle East] have not been giving that to them and those governments are now at risk, he said. Mr. Colin Powell warned that the outcome of events in the Middle East is unlikely to benefit the United States. a friend. ''I talked to her husband Mark last night. She's making progress every day.'' While it's ''far too early'' for the congresswoman to speak, Kirsten Gillibrand said, she's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and understand and show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. Gabrielle Giffords began breathing without a ventilator yesterday as doctors took out the breathing tube that had run down her throat and replaced it with a tracheotomy tube in her windpipe. Surgeons also inserted a feeding tube.

night before the game: He had his players fitted for rings. Then they went out and beat the Steelers. ''We knew we had a good team,'' cornerback Charles Woodson said. Another Michael Vick flap: A minor ruckus has arisen over a top Dallas official's presentation of a ''key to the city'' to Philadelphia quarterback Michael Vick . Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway presented the key

As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said, ''I care deeply about animals'' and ''am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to ''propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Dwaine Caraway said he would ''welcome a clarification of the guidelines.''
